name: The Music Box (CrossCore)
description:
A short & simplistic 2D platformer game about collecting music note to wind up a music box. 

Go through both endings to unveil the story.

THE MUSIC BOX

THE STORY

"You are a child seeking help from an old music box."

That's the basic idea that I had for this game at the start.

Inspired by Hunterdash559 story with the same title, 

Here's if you wanna read it, It's in the comment section. 

It's not the precise or exact same story as this game(I've added my own twist to the story)but reading it will surely give a lot more general idea of the story and what I tried accomplishing than just going through this game.                    

CONTROLS

Basic Platformer Controls.        

-  Arrow Keys or A and D to move.  

-  Space to Jump and also Dialogue

-  E to wind up the music box

-  Alt + F4 to quit midgame.

A NOTE FROM THE DEV

I tried to focused on the story aspect of it to cover up the lack of gameplay here, I might add more ending to make the story less vague.

This is my first game so it is far from perfect, there's still a lot of room for improvement. That being said on the off chance that someone actually playing this game, Thank you for playing  :).

Also it'd be super awesome if you could leave your thoughts and feedback about this game.

UPDATE

After some feedback It's seems the game has a problem with the difficulty. 

I've made some Difficulty adjustment in the v1.1.

If you don't mind about the difficulty then go with  v1.0. 

also I've fixed some Issues with UI  as well as small bugfixes in v1.1.

Please let me know if there's a bug. 

 ^-^
